gobblin.data.management.copy.hive

Class HiveCopyEntityHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.hive.HiveCopyEntityHelper

  • public class HiveCopyEntityHelper
extends Object
    Creates CopyEntitys for copying a Hive table.

    • Field Detail

      • COPY_TARGET_TABLE_ROOT

        public static final String COPY_TARGET_TABLE_ROOT
        Specifies a root path for the data in a table. All files containing table data will be placed under this directory.

        Does some token replacement in the input path. For example, if the table myTable is in DB myDatabase: /data/$DB/$TABLE -> /data/myDatabase/myTable. /data/$TABLE -> /data/myTable /data -> /data/myTable

        See javadoc for getCopyEntities() for further explanation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_TOBE_REPLACED

        public static final String COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_TOBE_REPLACED
        These two options, in pair, specify the output location of the data files on copy COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_TOBE_REPLACED specified the prefix of the path (without Scheme and Authority ) to be replaced COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_REPLACEMENT specified the replacement of COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_TOBE_REPLACED

        for example, if the data file is $sourceFs/data/databases/DB/Table/Snapshot/part-00000.avro , COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_TOBE_REPLACED is /data/databases COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_REPLACEMENT is /data/databases/_parallel then, the output location for that file will be $targetFs/data/databases/_parallel/DB/Table/Snapshot/part-00000.avro

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_REPLACEMENT

        public static final String COPY_TARGET_TABLE_PREFIX_REPLACEMENT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RELOCATE_DATA_FILES_KEY

        public static final String RELOCATE_DATA_FILES_KEY
        Specifies that, on copy, data files for this table should all be relocated to a single directory per partition. See javadoc for getCopyEntities() for further explanation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COPY_PARTITION_FILTER_GENERATOR

        public static final String COPY_PARTITION_FILTER_GENERATOR
        Use an implementation of PartitionFilterGenerator to dynamically create partition filter. The value should be the name of the implementation to use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FAST_PARTITION_SKIP_PREDICATE

        public static final String FAST_PARTITION_SKIP_PREDICATE
        A predicate applied to each partition before any file listing. If the predicate returns true, the partition will be skipped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DELETE_FILES_ON_DEREGISTER

        public static final String DELETE_FILES_ON_DEREGISTER
        Method for deleting files on deregister. One of HiveCopyEntityHelper.DeregisterFileDeleteMethod.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • resolvePath

        protected static Path resolvePath(String pattern,
                                  String database,
                                  String table)
        Takes a path with tokens databaseToken or tableToken and replaces these tokens with the actual database names and table name. For example, if db is myDatabase, table is myTable, then /data/$DB/$TABLE will be resolved to /data/myDatabase/myTable.

      • fullPathDiff

        protected static HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet fullPathDiff(HiveLocationDescriptor sourceLocation,
                                                               HiveLocationDescriptor desiredTargetLocation,
                                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<HiveLocationDescriptor> currentTargetLocation,
                                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<Partition> partition,
                                                               MultiTimingEvent multiTimer,
                                                               HiveCopyEntityHelper helper)
                                                        throws IOException
        Compares three entities to figure out which files should be copied and which files should be deleted in the target file system.
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Represents the source table or partition.
        desiredTargetLocation - Represents the new desired table or partition.
        currentTargetLocation - Represents the corresponding existing table or partition in the target hcat if it exists.
        partition - If present, contains partition information.
        Returns:
        A HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet with data on files to copy and delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the copy of this table / partition should be aborted.

      • getTargetPath

        public Path getTargetPath(Path sourcePath,
                          FileSystem targetFs,
                          com.google.common.base.Optional<Partition> partition,
                          boolean isConcreteFile)
        Compute the target Path for a file or directory referred by this table.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Source path to be transformed.
        targetFs - target FileSystem
        partition - partition this file belongs to.
        isConcreteFile - true if this is a path to an existing file in HDFS.
